pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit (any)
  • Processor: 2000+ MHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit (any)
  • Processor: 3000+ MHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX9xx or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
